item.description:
Come join us Tuesday Night November 15th at 7:00pm, For

NorthShore Networking at Night!

 

We will have plenty of time to NETWORK with others Businesses, Entrepreneurs, Investors, Companies and other like mined people to get the most out of our time.

There will be refreshments, Guest Speakers, Fun and pleasantries. Every guest speaker will have a door prize or a give away.

This creative group will be about the HOT Topics of Today's Business Atmosphere.

LIKE:

How to create a Social Presence.

Lead Generating Websites.

Social Business Branding.

How many stream of income in your business.

Becoming the local resource or expert.

 

If you have a business that relates to these subjects and would like to speak on that subject please contact me right away!!!!!

RSVP ASAP! We are capping this group to 20 people!!!

Anthony Pasquale
item.how_to_find_us: Ready to plan for the New Year!

group.name: The NorthShore Business Support Network meetup

item.name: Networking at Night! Three Speaker a Month will speak about increasing business!
